title: Dynamic Queue Auto Exit Bug that is Account Bound(reinstalling does not fix it)
body:
me and my Friends were Queued for Normal Draft pick 3 of us and the queue was taking an usually long time so we try to hit the [x] on the top of the queue and it wouldn't exit so we decide to get 1 of us to restart the client to make the lobby unqueue, but even tho 1 person closed the client it still kept us in queue. We All closed our clients got back on and now we can no longer play Ranked or draft norms. is there a Fix

My Friends whos queues are also broken are Hi Its Liz and Loudest Smile 

it has been messed up like this for hours, Relogging,uninstalling and reinstalling, going into different queues does not fix it nothing i hv tryed has worked, our accounts can no longer play ranked or draft norms.


Example of issue:  https://i.gyazo.com/8205974c897774eb450c48d49449e97d.gif

replies.body:
have u found a solution yet?
have the same problem and tried everything i could imagine to help but it still doesnt work :/
i ma on eune and is not work

might be an issue with something that isn't league. have you tried a working account on a comp that has had issues with this or an unworking account on a comp that is working?

make a quick smurf, and see if it still doesn't work. if it doesn't work, you should either take some time to figure out where the clash is, by checking resources and such for it, or you should reset your comp and redownload the important things one at a time starting with league and checking the queue after everything until either the issue is resolved and you get everything or you find the thing that is causing you to fail.

I mean, that's the proactive way to potentially solve this one, or to find more useful information.
i have same issue with the poster. But the situation just occor on my acc, i use my computer to log on my friends accounts. all of them work well except mine.
